items.sentence: I think Tom and Mary might actually get married.
Is Tom going to get out of prison any time soon?
Is it true that you wanted to live in Australia?
Is there someone you want to invite to my party?
Tom asked Mary what her father did for a living.
Tom said he thought that Mary understood French.
We\'ve been studying French for three years now.
Would you like me to help you with your luggage?
You\'re the one who has to do that, aren\'t you?
You\'re the one who should do that, aren\'t you?
You\'re the only one here who doesn\'t know Tom.
I\'ll see you there on the twentieth of October.
You\'re the one spending the most time with Tom.
You\'re the only one who can solve this problem.
She implied that she would like to come with us.
I can\'t afford to buy a car, much less a house.
Tom lives in an apartment not far from my place.
Has Tom been saying bad things about Mary again?
Tom didn\'t mention why he was looking for Mary.
Tom says he doesn\'t know what Mary wants to do.
I\'d like to talk to Tom about his brother John.
Tom said he had a terrible experience in Boston.
We need to learn all we can about what happened.
I can\'t put up with Tom\'s rudeness any longer.
I don\'t eat desserts unless I make them myself.
I don\'t like swimming in public swimming pools.
You might want to be more careful in the future.
Tom told me that he was going to commit suicide.
I can barely keep up with the rest of the class.
Tom is the great-great-grandson of John Jackson.
Why wouldn\'t you let me tell you what happened?
I didn\'t understand the teacher\'s explanation.
Tom and Mary went to the jewelry store together.
What are you going to wear to the party tonight?
What kind of dressing do you want on your salad?
Tom really should be getting ready for his trip.
I\'ve already told Tom what\'ll probably happen.
Against my advice, he fed his dog some raw pork.
Air is primarily made up of nitrogen and oxygen.
All I know is that Tom was here with me at 2:30.
I\'m not sure, but I think Tom wants to do that.
I\'m not the one who talked Tom into doing that.
I\'ve lost three pounds in the last three weeks.
In the morning, I was woken up by the telephone.
Tom never speaks French without making mistakes.
Tom never wanted to go there in the first place.
Tom snuck out and had a few beers with the guys.
Tom soon realized Mary had stolen all his money.
Tom speaks French too fast for me to understand.
Tom spent all morning in the interrogation room.
